api_json_response.title: response
api_json_response.description: The response from the fetch request

graph.title: graph
graph.description: The graph descriptor of the board to invoke.

configuration.name: createFetchParameters

item.summary: When a run has the `status: "requires_action"` and `required_action.type` is `submit_tool_outputs`, this endpoint can be used to submit the outputs from the tool calls once they're all completed. All outputs must be submitted in a single request.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the [thread](/docs/api-reference/threads) to which this run belongs.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: The ID of the run that requires the tool output submission.

tool_outputs.description: A list of tools for which the outputs are being submitted.

tool_call_id.description: The ID of the tool call in the `required_action` object within the run object the output is being submitted for.

output.description: The output of the tool call to be submitted to continue the run.

info.title: OpenAI API
info.description: The OpenAI REST API. Please see https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference for more details.

thread_id.title: thread_id
thread_id.description: The ID of the [thread](/docs/api-reference/threads) to which this run belongs.

run_id.title: run_id
run_id.description: The ID of the run that requires the tool output submission.

requestBody.title: requestBody
requestBody.description: The request body for the API call (JSON)
